
## Purpose

This is a working example to generate tabsets programmatically by looping over 
variables.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
plots <- mtcars |>
  group_by(cyl) |>
  nest() |>
  mutate(plot = map(data, \(x)
                    x |>
                      ggplot(aes(mpg, wt)) +
                      geom_point()))


render_tabs <- function(cyl, plot){
  cat(glue::glue("### {cyl} Cylinders   \n\n"))
  print(plot)
  cat(' \n \n')
}

```


::: {.panel-tabset}
```{r ggplot}
#| results: asis
plots |>
  pwalk(\(cyl, plot, ...) render_tabs(cyl, plot))
```
:::
